subdisciplines.name: Classical Mechanics
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mechanics that deals with the motion of particles and rigid bodies subjected to forces

subdisciplines.name: Quantum Mechanics
subdisciplines.description: The branch of mechanics that deals with the mathematical description of the motion and interaction of subatomic particles.

subdisciplines.name: Fluid Mechanics
subdisciplines.description: The study of fluids, including liquids, gases, and plasmas, and the forces on and within them.
